javadoc: Interface to define a map containing properties over a set of addresses.

methods.javadoc: Get the name for this property map.
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Get the name for this property map.

methods.name: intersects
methods.comment:
Given two addresses, indicate whether there is an address in
 that range (inclusive) having the property.

params.name: start
params.comment: the start of the range.

params.name: end
params.comment: the end of the range.

return.comment:
boolean true if at least one address in the range
 has the property, false otherwise.

methods.name: intersects
methods.comment:
Indicate whether there is an address within
 the set which exists within this map.

params.name: set
params.comment: set of addresses

return.comment:
boolean true if at least one address in the set
 has the property, false otherwise.

methods.name: removeRange
methods.comment: Removes all property values within a given range.

params.name: start
params.comment: begin range

params.name: end
params.comment: end range, inclusive

return.comment:
true if any property value was removed; return
 		false otherwise.

methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Remove the property value at the given address.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address where the property should be removed

return.comment:
true if the property value was removed, false
   otherwise.

methods.javadoc:
returns whether there is a property value at addr.
@param addr the address in question
methods.name: hasProperty
methods.comment: returns whether there is a property value at addr.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address in question

methods.name: getObject
methods.comment:
Returns the property value stored at the specified 
 address or null if no property found.

params.name: addr
params.comment: property address

methods.name: getNextPropertyAddress
methods.comment: Get the next address where the property value exists.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address from which to begin the search (exclusive).

methods.name: getPreviousPropertyAddress
methods.comment: Get the previous Address where a property value exists.

params.name: addr
params.comment:
the address from which
 		to begin the search (exclusive).

methods.javadoc: Get the first Address where a property value exists.
methods.name: getFirstPropertyAddress
methods.comment: Get the first Address where a property value exists.

methods.javadoc:
Get the last Address where a property value exists.
@exception NoSuchIndexException thrown if there is no address having the property value.
methods.name: getLastPropertyAddress
methods.comment: Get the last Address where a property value exists.

methods.javadoc: Get the number of properties in the map.
methods.name: getSize
methods.comment: Get the number of properties in the map.

methods.javadoc: Returns an iterator over the indices having a property value. @exception TypeMismatchException thrown if the property does not have values of type Object.
methods.name: getPropertyIterator
methods.comment:
Returns an iterator over the indices having a property
 value.

methods.name: getPropertyIterator
methods.comment:
Returns an iterator over addresses that have a property
 value.

params.name: forward
params.comment:
if true will iterate in increasing address order, otherwise it will start at
 the end and iterate in decreasing address order

methods.javadoc: Returns an iterator over the addresses that a property value. @exception TypeMismatchException thrown if the property does not have values of type Object.
methods.name: getPropertyIterator
methods.comment:
Returns an iterator over the addresses that a property
 value.

methods.name: getPropertyIterator
methods.comment:
Returns an iterator over the addresses that have a property value and
 are in the given address set.

params.name: asv
params.comment: the set of addresses to iterate over.

methods.javadoc:
Returns an iterator over the addresses that have a property value and
 are in the given address set.
@param forward if true will iterate in increasing address order, otherwise it will start at
 the end and iterate in decreasing address order
methods.name: getPropertyIterator
methods.comment:
Returns an iterator over the addresses that have a property value and
 are in the given address set.

params.name: forward
params.comment:
if true will iterate in increasing address order, otherwise it will start at
 the end and iterate in decreasing address order

methods.name: getPropertyIterator
methods.comment:
Returns an iterator over the address having a property
 value.

params.name: start
params.comment: the starting address

params.name: forward
params.comment:
if true will iterate in increasing address order, otherwise it will start at
 the end and iterate in decreasing address order

methods.name: applyValue
methods.comment:
Applies a property value at the indicated address without knowing its 
 type (String, int, long, etc.) by using the property visitor.

params.name: visitor
params.comment:
the property visitor that lets you apply the property
 without knowing its specific type ahead of time.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address where the property is to be applied.

methods.name: moveRange
methods.comment:
Moves the properties defined in the range from the start address thru the 
 end address to now be located beginning at the newStart address. 
 The moved properties will be located at the same relative location to 
 the newStart address as they were previously to the start address.

params.name: start
params.comment: the start of the range to move.

params.name: end
params.comment: the end of the range to move.

params.name: newStart
params.comment:
the new start location of the range of properties 
 after the move.

name: PropertyMap
comment: Interface to define a map containing properties over a set of addresses.
